website_summaries.verdict: Stylish design and smaller frame size make the Safety Girl an attractive alternative for female users. We wish the lenses were more scratch resistant, but we do like the improved fit and comfort of the frame design.
pros: Stylish oversize arms and wrap-around lenses (available in clear or amber)
Designed specifically for users with smaller frame sizes
Meet ANSI safety regulations and provide UV protection
cons: Inexpensive plastic construction raises durability issues
Not recommended for heavy-duty lab or medical use

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. I love the nose guard, this is a big deal when you are in a manufacturing environment for hours on end. I love the color and I have received several requests already and I have only had them for a day. They come with pre-made holes for a strap band. I mean these were made with me in mind. The shipping was amazing! Very quick shipping time. Cannot go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I work in the operating room at a trauma hospital so the blocking sides by the By my ears help tremendously! Plus they hardly ever fog up and are very comfortable!! Will buy more for spares!!
customer_reviews.author: robyn cleary

customer_reviews.title: Nose Guard can be Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Five stars BECAUSE I got the add-on deal, since at least one side of the nose guard pops off everytime I take them off. That’s after sweating, though, so maybe this won’t happen for those in cooler weather or for chicks who simply sweat less than I do! (or dudes perhaps, who totally know how to rock hot pink!) They are much cuter and wrap a little further than the version I’d been using from Dollar Tree, so all-in-all, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: Very cute goggles-even look great on gingeys!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute pink safety goggles! I bought them as a gift for my girly coworker and she loves them- a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O'B

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and I'm the cutest person in the lab! I also have a very small head and these do not fall off my face! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Atallah

customer_reviews.title: Classy but not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for 4 stars is for some reason only the right side of these glasses hurt my ears really bad. Odd, huh? I mean, I understand these glasses are not custom fit for me so I didn't expect perfection but I've never had this issue with other eye wear and it really hurt. I tried to adjust them but didn't help. Otherwise, the visibility is great. The pink color is a nice flare for the working girly girl. I didn't wear them until after the return period so I will keep them. I like the Safety Girl brand so I'm going to look for another option.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shooting glasses
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Amber lenses in the red frame and wish that I could purchase them in clear lenses also in red, but I bought the clear in the pink frame since I can't buy them in red, comfortable and accurate site for outdoor shooting, they're flat against the sides so fit under muffs - I don't think that I'll be needing any for a while since I ordered them in pack's
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Belle

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable safety glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product when I cleaned my bathtub and shower spraying it with Clorox mold and mildew cleaner which is very strong. I wanted to protect my eyes doing this chore. I also purchased them because Dr. Fauci on the Coronavirus doctor stated even if you are wearing a mask, if someone sneezes or coughs in your direction and the droplets get into your eyes you can potentially get the virus. They are very lightweight you hardly notice they are on. Love them. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mantione

customer_reviews.title: Go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are tremendously uncomfortable on the nose. I suggest purchasingFurther, just because I purchased these in pink, I now get recommendations for all the pink "women's" shop accessories. Ridiculous and obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: jenette

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in these glasses! I bought a single pair on a test run for a bulk order for all of the new female interns on my jobsite (so the men would be less inclined to grab them when they forget/misplace theirs!) They're cheaply made,with rough edges around the lens perimeter and the lenses gap at the frames. Thankfully, they weren't terribly expensive to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT fit over rx glasses
customer_reviews.text: I specifically got these because a couple of reviews and one of the Q&A responses said they fit over prescription glasses. However, I just received mine and they do NOT fit over my glasses. My frames about medium sized. The safety glasses may be cute but I’m sending them back and I guess I’ll have to go with the boring ugly safety glasses that fit over prescription glasses.
customer_reviews.author: RuthieB

customer_reviews.title: STYLISH "WEAR OVER" PRESCRIPTION SAFETY GLASSES
customer_reviews.text: I love these as they fit over my prescription glasses. I don't do a lot of DIY projects but so I wanted an inexpensive pair of safety glasses as I am building my "ladies toolbox". I have a fairly thin face and they don't slide off either.There are no vision blind spots. A long time ago I had special prescription sports glasses made and they cost a fortune, let alone had to be changed when your RX changes. I refuse to wear things with "man-sweat" so these work for that purpose as well!
customer_reviews.author: JDonna

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: these fit my smaller face ok, and they fit well enough to not slide off my face without being too tight behind my ears like some safety glasses are, but one of the tiny screws holding one ear piece on keeps coming loose. I have to tighten it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Ferretkingdom

customer_reviews.title: I want to look cute, ok?
customer_reviews.text: Yeah I'm a girl and I wanted pink safety glasses. So what. Now all the boys are jealous of my stylish colorful glasses as they wear their bland 70's style glasses. Sometimes they even ask to borrow mine! The glasses work great and keep me feeling cute.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: PPE perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the clear ones to wear as PPE while working as an ER nurse and they are amazing. I bought a few different ones and these were my favorite by far. Came back for the 3 pack after the first pair eventually wore out from me dropping them a bunch of times from my head taking off masks but that was normal wear and tear in my opinion and my fault for being a klutz!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but they also have great coverage and do an amazing job at keeping my ...
customer_reviews.text: As an orthodontist assistant it's very important for me to wear protective eye wear to keep siliva, wires ext. out of my eyes, I however have always had trouble finding ones that would hold up well and completely protect my eyes until I found these! These glasses not only fit me perfectly, which is extremely rare due to me having a narrow face, but they also have great coverage and do an amazing job at keeping my eyes protected! Also I don't have any trouble with them sliding off my face or fogging up, I highly recommend these safety glasses I wouldn't hesitate to purchase another pair myself and I already have two!
customer_reviews.author: H. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I do not want to rate these glasses too low, but I was definitely disappointed. I am a small 21 year old female and these glasses are far too small for me. I wear children's glasses at the eye doctor. These gave me extreme pain in the temples after wearing them only a few minutes. Perhaps they have changed the size since many of the people on here state they fit small framed faces well. I don't think they are worth the cost to return, so I will leave them at the lab and hope they fit someone. They are definitely cute and otherwise well-designed, although I agree with a previous reviewer that they have a cheap feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harris

customer_reviews.title: Really like these
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair – first one after years of usage, dropping them on to cement, broke. Got my money’s worth regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Gail F. Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Super uncomfy!!
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. I know they're cheap so i wasn't expecting much but they are un-wearable. Super uncomfortable and tight and the lens are just naturally cloudy. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - I use these for 'shop' type projects to protect my eyes
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great! They fit well, feel good on and don't bother my eyes (like if the clear polycarbonate was of poor quality). They are lightweight and even though I have a smaller head (petite build) and they fit great. I can leave them on for a long time and don't feel that need to take them off because they're bothersome. Simply just great. And a good value.
customer_reviews.author: iClaudio

customer_reviews.title: Healthcare needs glasses that don't scratch
customer_reviews.text: The glasses while cute and comfortable, scratch easily. As an anesthesia provider, I need really good visibility to intubate my patients especially now with COVID. If they did not scratch they would be golden
customer_reviews.author: patricia Anne Parolari

customer_reviews.title: Recommend & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute and works over my regular glasses. I have a wide head and these fit perfect. Lightweight and did the trick when I was breaking out floor tiles with a hammer & chisel.
customer_reviews.author: Sister

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking to find a pair of "Safety" glasses to wear when I am doing yard work on our 30 acres of land. I have to do a lot of tree trimming and mowing. I had a pair of "Safety" glasses my husband gave to me, but they kept sliding off my face every time I would bend over. It drove me CrAzY! These were the PERFECT solution! They fit perfect, the tint is perfect and the color is perfect! I plan to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sunniday62

customer_reviews.title: The wife love the safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: She is wearing the safety glasses with her face mask to avoid catching the Covid-19 virus because you can catch the virus with contact to your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: gmcajun

customer_reviews.title: Love love love safety girl.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because I work construction and as one of only a couple women I get sick of blues and greens so I'm going to buy all safety girl pink items.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a dental hygienist and normally wear loupes. I had to send them in for repair and was in need of some safety glasses for the first time in 7 years. I love the color of these. Most safety glasses are ugly but these actually make you look cute and feminine! They're a good stand by to have when I loupes are out of commission.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Don't fog up, sit nicely on nose, and if you are a male wearing them your chances of a male stealing then are slim to none. Yes your friends may poke fun at you but again most male workers will not steal them.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Pink , and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These pink safety glasses are wonderful and comfortable as well as stylish!! I hate looking bland amongst my fellow warehouse employees. The glasses come with a great cushioned nose guard and this keeps them on my face! Wonderful investment.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: Fit GREAT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So exited. These are the most comfortable well fitting safety glasses (I own about 6 different pairs). Will buy a couple more!
customer_reviews.author: Silke

customer_reviews.title: Broke way to easily
customer_reviews.text: Well they broke . They did scratch.. The screws that’s holds them on just fell off and I put them back together and the very thin piece of plastic holding the screws cracked . So can’t wear them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Madron

customer_reviews.title: Great Protective Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very light weight & fit well. I use them for sports & like them because they don’t steam up. Very reasonably priced too.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged nicely, very clear and comfortable. Does NOT distort my vision like other safety glasses. Love them and will buy again when needed
customer_reviews.author: coffeepleese

customer_reviews.title: They feel light as a feather
customer_reviews.text: I hate hate HATE wearing safety goggles in lab. However, I know how important it is to have adequate eye protection. I wanted to get a pair of goggles that are stylish looking, and will be light enough to wear that I don't notice them on my face. These are ideal for that. I put them on in the beginning of my lab class, and walked out of lab three hours later while still wearing them. I forgot they were even on my face. This is exactly what I want from safety equipment: for it to be unobtrusive, stylish, and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Dinakar Sarma

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: I used these safety classes for a biology lab and they worked great for my purpose. They were comfortable and fine to wear for long periods of time. They weren't too tight or too loose and the nose piece was not uncomfortable at all. The lens was also completely clear. There were no smudges or anything on the glasses. They don't fog up at all which I have found to be an issue with other glasses. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Had the coolest safety glasses in microbiology class
customer_reviews.text: These safety glasses worked great for my micro class, I loved the look of the pink frames and how they securely stood out from the plain Jane black and clear ones. They fit perfect and I had no issues with them slipping off my nose. Only problem is I forgot to grab them out of our lab boxes on the last day! I'm sure they're being put to good use by another student now though!
customer_reviews.author: nicole wilson

customer_reviews.title: comfortable but broke after 1 month heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these glasses to protect myself as a healthcare provider during the covid epidemic. They were very comfortable around the nose area and did not fog. They inevitably broke after extremely heavy use and poor treatment for a month...I dropped them and the plastic lens cracked.
customer_reviews.author: viveyanne

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: I half-jokingly bought these for my wife to do yard work with (she has fallen in love with the leaf blower). She gave me the "I'm humoring you" smile and then started wearing them. Now she loves them; they are comfortable and have good clear lenses. The joke ended up being half-serious. I would consider buying these again, but also love the 3M Trekk 11329s I bought for myself. Both seem to be well-made and comfortable glasses. These are a good value, and cute.
customer_reviews.author: AvatarDad

customer_reviews.title: My daughter uses these for wood shop at Construction Careers ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these for wood shop at Construction Careers Academy. She loves them! They’re very durable (she breakers her iPhone screen often, but hasn’t broken these yet). She loves that she’s the only girl in shop with pink safety glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Prissy Missy

customer_reviews.title: Would totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest thing I’ve ever had in lab😂 I got a matching pink lab coat and I don’t care how posh that is I love them. And they work super well functionally plus they’re super comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.author: ana'ly jarboeee

customer_reviews.title: A Little Too "Bendy" For My Liking
customer_reviews.text: I Truly Thought That These Would Be More Sturdy, Hard Plastic Safety Glasses But These Were Quite "Bendy". They're Still Cute Though.
customer_reviews.author: Nikeisha

customer_reviews.title: Is ok but for covert your eyes from the pandemia
customer_reviews.text: Well they are very good and pretty if was not for covert from the coronavirus
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in pink
customer_reviews.text: Pretty in pink, light weight and scratch resistant. Can wear all day without causing headache. No distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Reust

customer_reviews.title: not good for shooting
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware these are NOT scratch resistant. I have worn mine once and already they are scratched. They are not comfortable for extended wear, or even more than a few minutes. There is also a large gap between the bottom of the glasses and the face. The only positive thing I can say is that they do not fog.
customer_reviews.author: Crello

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Ex- GirlFriend is gonna Love it!! It's all she ever wanted & talked about. Had to support fight of cancer also!! ~MR."K"~
customer_reviews.author: ~MR."K"~

customer_reviews.title: good value and price
customer_reviews.text: dont cry when breal or scratch but come in handy on sunny day or cutting
customer_reviews.author: 3 BOYS

customer_reviews.title: Srcatches and scuffs somehow?
customer_reviews.text: I used these when i was working as a dental assistant, the most that would hit these glasses would be saliva... but these somehow managed to get scratched and damaged pretty badly over the course of a few months and i stopped being able to see clearly out them... we're great in the beginning though. 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower~

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife , only been used once. Looks like it’s gonna do fine
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small face and buying glasses can be hard. These fit my face great! I use them for yard work.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Star

customer_reviews.title: So my daughter wouldn't shoot her eye out!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter as she was remodeling a house with her boyfriend. Just so happens she lives in the area where The Christmas Story house is(Cleveland) so I had to get these so she wouldn't shoot her eye out with a nail gun or something. :-) She loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: Pink basic safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: Basic safety glasses, I bought them for target shooting eyewear for my daughter and me. They do the job, my daughter likes them because they are pink. But if you have a daughter who helps outside or in the garage, they would also be a cool way of getting them to wear eye protection. Nothing fancy but was a good price for a set of 3.
customer_reviews.author: C. Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: I just wore these protective glasses as I sanded a project I was working on at home. The glasses were comfortable, lightweight and covered my eyes around the sides as well. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: they do what they are supposed to do, worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This fit my female med to thin build face perfectly. They seem heavier duty than I expected. The eye protection wraps all the way around the sides and most importantly they are COMFORTABLE! the nose bridge is very thick and well made. Light on my face, i was able to wear for hours comfortably. I do not think these would fit well over glasses comfortably, but it had enough room that it might be possible.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Kichman

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Protection
customer_reviews.text: I got these glasses to protect my eyes when I make soap. They are nice and clear so that I can read the numbers on my scale and read labels on my oils. The nose guard makes them very comfortable and the pink color will keep my husband from using them.
customer_reviews.author: coletrane

customer_reviews.title: a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: the glass is cute but it's a little heavy for me at least. And it can be foggy...So please take precautions when you have to go from the hot toward the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous me

customer_reviews.title: Can't use for work.
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on scratch resistance yet. They look nice. I used them one on a medical call. Comfort is ok but they fog up so I won't be able to use them at work. I'm an EMT and need to be able to see what I'm doing. Don't have time to keep wiping and readjusting while performing patient care.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: but they fit better because they were a women's cut and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these instead of buying the standard pair sold by the University Bookstore. Not only were they cheaper, but they fit better because they were a women's cut and I have a small head/face. I'm not crazy about pink but I did stand out in lab. It served its purpose well and I saved them for if I ever need them again. I plan to use them for woodworking.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Chemistry Student
customer_reviews.text: I will admit I bought these out of vanity. I was sick of those ugly, bulky goggles for chemistry lab. Turned out there were other great features than just the feminine, pink adornment! They are easier to see out of (though still not as clear as if I wasn't wearing anything. Also note, I don't wear glasses or contacts), they don't mess up my hair, and they don't fog up. I definitely recommend these to any chem student that likes the color pink!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was being such a diva at work and refusing to wear safety glasses. So I bought these instead. Now I don't want to take them off!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D

customer_reviews.title: Love Amazon but in this case you get what you ...
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say, Love Amazon but in this case you get what you pay for. Not worth the trouble and expense to return. Put your money towards a better pair. Sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny J

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m an RN and we have to wear safety glasses at all times, these are comfortable, lightweight, and have a great fit for wearing 12+ hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Yates

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, No slip
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! I work in the dental field and this are PERFECT! They don’t slide down my nose and they don’t fog up! Fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protective Goggles Don't Slip Down Your Nose
customer_reviews.text: These protective glasses are just what I was looking for. They are comfortable, fit over regular glasses well, do not slide down the nose, stay in place, and are crystal clear. Best of all, they protect the eyes well from any debris that might fly from woodworking. They're actually better than I thought they'd be, well worth the money spent on them.
customer_reviews.author: CoolGramma

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but don't expect high quality
customer_reviews.text: These suit their purpose fine (chemistry lab) and don't fog up. They're also reasonably comfortable. When they're closed, however, the arms scratch the heck out of the inside of both lenses leaving a big line up the center of your viewing area which is pretty annoying. It also appears that they've doubled in price since I purchased them (bummer).
customer_reviews.author: J. Mignone

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. They fit great! Look great! And the color is great!
customer_reviews.author: Chrstyblk

customer_reviews.title: Randomly break, for no apparent reason
customer_reviews.text: They survived 2 years of infrequent but careful use. Then yesterday the arm came off while they were laying there, chilling.
customer_reviews.author: No1

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye protection and great color
customer_reviews.text: These glasses fit well and are comfortable to wear. The eye coverage seems to match the standards. These tend to stay in place well. They are also easy to find with their bright colors so I don't tend to misplace them as easily as I would if they were just black or clear. Plus all the boys in my house know they're mine so they tend to leave them alone.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Eckels

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my better half for when she helps me in the wood ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my better half for when she helps me in the wood shop - hot pink - there is no mistake these have there own designated space in my safety supply cabinet. When those chips are flying - I know she'll be protected from the debris, plus, she looks HOT in pink! Wait! I am supposta be focusing on my wood working, not how hot she looks in her shop outfit. Priorities! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ken Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying something more expensive
customer_reviews.text: They are really cute. But they arent very comfortable (it hurt by my ears) and they scratched super easily. I ended up throwing them away after a few months because I was unable to see anymore. I only used them 3 times a week so it was a bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself and they fit fine however, I don't like the fact that they are not adjustable. They are lightweight which is a plus but, the lenses scratch easily which is a major downside. The pink color of rim and the arms are vibrant and pretty. In the end though I feel as though the quality could have and should have been a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Saftey Goggles
customer_reviews.text: I brought these safety goggles for soap making. I received them on time as scheduled. I tried them on and they fit perfectly. They look just like the picture they used. It goes all the way around your eye and cover the sides which is great. These are my first and I have to say I am completely satisfied with them. If they ever break I would buy the same exact one again.
customer_reviews.author: Erica D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of it. Bought it to use when I'm crafting or painting.
customer_reviews.author: Izzyquinnzilla

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: They work fine. I found them to be uncomfortable on my ears but overall they seem to be a cheap good product.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Plastic could be changes to a better material. It looks a but unprofessional from being ...
customer_reviews.text: Plastic could be changes to a better material. It looks a but unprofessional from being able to see the lines where it is seemed together. It does the job though.
customer_reviews.author: Justeena

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite!! First pair of safety glasses I've found ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite!! First pair of safety glasses I've found that don't fog up when I wear a mask at work!! If only I had see the 3 pack for 10.95 instead of the single for 7.29! Next time!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer king

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good glasses. They do scratch pretty easily but decent price.
customer_reviews.author: buckeye

customer_reviews.title: It’s a shame
customer_reviews.text: It arrived today and what a shame cause it looks pretty nice but they really took their time to make it properly and made sure that everything is in the right places. I will return this and buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: MBAD

customer_reviews.title: Great safety glasses for women!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of safety glasses for the money. I have a small face for a girl and these fit really well. There is a rubber nose piece that makes the fit perfect and they offer side protection also. They are not anti-fog, but I have not had a problem with them fogging up when I used them. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Ratched

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but effective eye protection
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing some renovation projects around the house and wanted something to help protect my eyes from the dust and other things. And these worked just fine - they fit my face comfortably and did a good job. The reason I am giving 4 stars instead of 5 is that they scratch very easily so they're not all that durable, but they are inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Safety Girl SC-282 Safety Glasses--Pink
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after having cataract surgery. I like to bake and with the hot temperature of the oven, I wanted to protect my eyes. A plus with these glasses, they are fashionable. Now my eyes are healed and I have glasses to use in other safety situations around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mbrassaw

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love the are tinted to help shade from the sun, they are cute and I love them. Would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Environmental Science lab
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Environmental Science lab. Very happy I don't have to wear the big, ugly goggles. They looked great out of the package, no scratches, just like the picture. They are made of plastic though and seem like they may break easily so I would advise putting them in a glasses case. Great for the price though!
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn

customer_reviews.title: PINK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and fun. Doesn't fit over my glasses well, so I have to wear a less fun pair. When I wear contacts, these are my favorite safety goggles to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Allons-y

customer_reviews.title: Why does everyone always know where mom puts her things ...
customer_reviews.text: Why does everyone always know where mom puts her things? My guys won't be caught outside wearing these. LOL. i work in the chemical industry where safety glasses are required at all times. These glasses meet all company safety requirements!
customer_reviews.author: cbnlj

customer_reviews.title: Great but may need to widen arms
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses I work in the pharmaceutical industry and these are good, wear them everyday. But... the arms does squeeze my head near the back of my ears because the arms are so tight together.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this for my chemistry class yet but I use it when chopping onions until then. I Really liked the price of these, I'm not a huge fan of the pink but it will do. I got these for my Chemistry class for next semester so I would not have to wear my husbands ones from years ago (they look huge on me!). So these ones are nicer for a smaller face, and they do a good job of keeping onion smell out of your eyes if that's what you use them for.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kriska

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable ladles safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: They are great purchase! They work well for work in the laboratory. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: Fit for a Princess
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as gifts for little girls living in a shelter in the Middle East. They were a huge hit. They curved design keeps the glaring sun out and they said they felt like super hero princesses!
customer_reviews.author: Tea Bee

customer_reviews.title: Safety Girl Safety Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Pure vanity to have safety glasses in pink! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: N. Eral

customer_reviews.title: I would buy time and time again as the opportunity arrises.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for household safety. Keeps your eyes protected and does not fog up in the slightest. Very reasonable price that is impossible to beat and great quality! It is hard to think that the company selling these are making any money off them! I would buy time and time again as the opportunity arrises.
customer_reviews.author: Stanly

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I use them for work, second time I have ordered they hold up really well. I only had to replace them due to breaking them at my own fault.
customer_reviews.author: T.K.R

customer_reviews.title: It's great, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I use it while making soaps. It's great, lightweight, not foggy and doesn't slip over my nose. Black rubber part gives good comfort while wearing. Overall, it's the best protective glasses I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: They work great.
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for years at work. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: ... as protective eye wear while shooting my gun-- they're super cute & fit well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with the intentions of wearing them as protective eye wear while shooting my gun-- they're super cute & fit well!
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair for safety glasses for my Microbiology college course. These were cheap (less than $4 is what I paid) and they provide great coverage! I have super long eyelashes and I have always had that uncomfortable feeling of them touching and brushing up against the lenses. These glasses sit far enough away where that doesn't happen. Awesome pair!
customer_reviews.author: elven_princess

customer_reviews.title: I am a girly girl so the pink color was a fun addition.
customer_reviews.text: I got these goggles to keep dust out of my eyes when completely sanding the varnish and stain off of a table. They did the trick and I did not get anything in my eyes. I am a girly girl so the pink color was a fun addition.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Nope , really ,No.
customer_reviews.text: Lenses that horribly blurred my vision, they feel like the 99cent kids toy glasses.
customer_reviews.author: LILLY

customer_reviews.title: Great for my science themed trunk party for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Great for my science themed trunk party for my daughter. And used actually used them for her chemistry lab. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for cutting grass and small projects around the house, wanted a light weight comfortable glasses, so far love it has worked perfect for what i needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Duran

customer_reviews.title: Safety Goggles
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these for paintballs, airsoft wars, slingshot wars, firecracker wars, nerf wars, and the like. I appreciate this product as they are pink for my tween and they keep her eyes safe. A well made product that came on time. Would be utilized for 8 years old or above-or anyone who can wear standard adult-sized sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Nic C
